ExperienceSummary.Description: ~~~~~~   is experienced in:  Marketing (Marketing Communications); and Sales.    ~~~~~~   appears to be a low-to-mid level candidate, with 3 years of experience.

Positions.Description:
Helped plan the Film Festival event as well as associated meetings, awards show, and conferences.

Supported senior leadership by developing status reports on activities related to planning, scheduling,
cancellation, inquiries, resourcing, risk mitigation and proposal development for the events.


Conducted live and taped interviews of filmmakers and festival goers for promotional materials.

Managed event logistics and operations, including support staff, vendor services and volunteers.
Providing creative counsel via email, video and voice calls, or in person.

JobTitle.Raw: Multitalented  Graphic  Designer  and  Marketing  Specialist
JobTitle.Normalized: Multitalented Graphic Designer and Marketing Specialist

Positions.Description:
Multitalented  Graphic  Designer  and  Marketing  Specialist  with  extensive  experience  in multimedia marketing and video production. Passionate and driven to develop successful

campaigns that both satisfy clients and meet demanding growth objectives.

WORK	EXPERIENCE

SALES AND MARKETING SPECIALIST
Lynne Malkoff Promotions, Inc	|	August 2019 - August 2020

Managed full-cycle marketing and advertising strategies including estimating costs, managing resource

allocation and adjusting production schedules.

Maintain ed professional and technical knowledge by attending educational workshops; reviewing
publications; establishing personal networks; participating in networking organizations

Wrote, created and designed engaging and successful marketing, advertising and website copy.
Worked with manufacturers in the sourcing of PPE products for facilities across the nation increasing the company's profitability and success.
Created a wide range of graphics and layouts for product illustrations, product artwork, and websites
graphics with software such as photoshop.

Created successful videos and other promotional graphics that led to thousands of views and increased engagement on social media.

Assisted with the successful charity event Canvas4Kids that featured Kiefer Sutherland, Ray Wylie
Hubbard, Zane Williams and many other country musicians.
o	WORKS INDEPENDENTLY OR AS PART OF A	 Worked within tight time constraints under a fast paced and chaotic environment.

TEAM   Creat ed design elements for a successful social media and event marketing strategy.

o	STRONG ORGANIZATIONAL SKILLS	Worked the soundboard and remote broadcast equipment during  live broadcasts.

Worked alongside retail representatives to boost sales by enhancing product presentations and advertising collateral.
Trained new employees on up-selling, cross-selling, and customer service techniques Successfully
assisted hundreds of customers per day in-person and via telephone with purchase decisions,
transactions, returns, and inquiries.
Applied security and loss prevention training toward recognizing risks and reducing store theft.

Maintained records related to sales, returns and inventory availability.

Achievements: Helped plan the Film Festival event as well as associated meetings, awards show, and conferences

achieve  the artist 's desired aesthetic

LITERATURE	and Illustrator to achieve the artist's desired aesthetic
VIDEO PRODUCTION ASSISTANT

"Love Breaks" - Independent Short Film	|	April 2017 - August 2017

Communicated with cast and crew and help the director implement his ideas for each scene shoot
Catered to the needs of the cast and crew and making sure everyone is working efficiently working
under a fast-paced environment with strict deadlines.

Applied general beauty makeup and SFX makeup to the talent.

Designed and executed strategies for implementing the shooting schedule in an effective manner

Assisted costume designers, directors, camera people and other crew members

Findings.Message: We detected that this document contained at least some data that was laid out as columns or tables. We rearranged that data to make it more usable. NEVER use columns or tables in a resume.
You should not use the PDF format for your resume. Due to inherent limitations with text extraction from PDFs, you are less likely to get a job when using a PDF resume.
A street level address was not found in the contact information. A full contact address should always be included in a resume as it allows for location based searches.
Every degree in a resume should have a name or type associated with it, such as 'B.S.' or 'M.S.'.
Your resume includes a References section. References should NEVER be included in a resume.

The following section was identified as a skills section type: 'PERSONAL	SKILLS'. Skills should not be in a separate section, but instead, each skill should be included in the descriptions of work history or education. THIS IS INCREDIBLY IMPORTANT FOR AI MATCHING ALGORITHMS
Every section should have a clear, unambiguous, commonly-used header on a separate line directly above the content associated with it.
